string.value: The Empress, who just returned to Maple World, has given a pendant for the explorers to Cassandra. I better talk to her for more information on this.
The Empress, who just returned to Maple World, has given a pendant for the explorers to Cassandra. I better talk to her for more information on this.
Within the black aura of the Black Mage, let's try to find #t4001237#. \n\n#i4001237# #t4001237# #b#c4001237# / 20#k

Empress Cygnus is back! She came to me and left a Pendant of the Spirit, and I discovered that this pendant actually possesses a secret special power. If you are curious about the kind of power in this pendant, find and ask me in the nearest town!
Really? You really don't need it? You might regret it later.

The special power in this pendant is released the moment you equip it. When you wear it, your EXP will increase more than better. Isn't that a great form of blessing? But that's not the only thing. As time goes on, it'll help raise your EXP even more, so take good care of it!
